name: NPR
text:
Police have arrested and charged a 31-year-old man over a shooting during an attempt by protesters to topple a conquistador statue in New Mexico.

The suspect is a one-time candidate for city council and son of a former sheriff.
https://t.co/KKHrQtkIVU
